arianagrandesource 160995873976 "2017-05-23 20:40:32 GMT" https://arianagrandesource.tumblr.com/post/160995873976/there-are-pictures-of-arianas-crew-and-family "There are pictures of Ariana’s crew and family arriving in Florida. We haven’t seen any of Ariana yet
column2: but we won’t post them anyway to respect her
column3: her crew and her entire family. We think it’s only fair to give them the break they deserve after a trauma like this and not be as insensitive as those paps were by taking pics of them. We’re sorry if some of you may be upset by this decision
column4: but we honestly think it’s the right thing to do right now!We can confirm that there are a few pictures of Ariana. She
column5: as well as her entire team and family are back in Boca Raton

column2: taxies in the centre of the city are offering free rides home The Holiday Inn are currently looking after dozens of stranded children unable to contact their parents
column3: please call 0161 836 9600 Anyone in need of a room or a lift home
column4: please check the #roomformanchester tag on twitter and other social medias. Various other people are offering rooms online. x x PLEASE ONLY CONTACT THE AMBULANCE SERVICE IF YOU ARE IN A LIFE THREATENING SITUATION Central Manchester is apparently on lockdown so please do not visit the city centre
column5: remain on the outskirts and at a distance from the Arena PLEASE DO NOT POST/SHARE IMAGES OR VIDEOS OF THE INJURED OR DECEASED VICTIMS OF THE EXPLOSION " False text

column2: Ariana Grande fans — AKA “Arianators” — excitedly gathered for a shared purpose; to watch her perform the songs they love. But
column3: the awful events which transpired that night meant that some of those fans didn’t make it home. Grande fans are now mourning the loss to their fanbase; a community whose shared love of her music spans several generations. And
column4: that curious ability to transcend generations stems from her own evolution from an innocent teenage Nickelodeon star to a grown-up pop star who appeals to adults and children alike.Grande found fame as Cat Valentine in the Nickelodeon television serious Victorious
column5: and later in the show’s spinoff Sam & Cat. As she evolved into a pop star singing songs with distinctly adult themes
column6: Grande struck a fine balance that so many teen stars have struggled to achieve. She managed to hold on to young fans who grew up watching her on TV. “That’s what her music comes down to for me. It’s inclusion
column7: ” Joffe continued. “Catch me blasting her songs in my earbuds on my way to and from work for many years to come. I feel connected to her in a way I don’t with other pop stars because of her inclusive nature.”For 19-year-old Ellen McArthur and her 11-year-old sister Freya
column8: Grande’s music resonates for different reasons. “For Freya
column9: being a fan of hers makes her feel cooler and it’s something she can talk to other people at school with
column10: ” says Ellen. And while the sexy undertones of Grande’s songs are very obvious to Ellen
column11: they go straight over her younger sister’s head. “It’s because her lyrics are totally open to interpretation. The songs are meaningful to adults
column12: but to younger children they’re cute pop songs you can dance along to
column14: Grande represents strength. “Ariana’s music is more than just someone singing over a musical beat. Ariana’s music is strength
column17: ” says 17-year-old fan Stephanie. “She has songs like ""One last time” and “Thinking of you” which now hold such a strong meaning to our fanbase since the Manchester tragedy.“ Grande’s music is meaningful because of its ability to include
column18: empower and entertain fans of all ages. Sadly some of those songs have taken on a tragic dimension this week.  But
column19: the response by ‘Arianators’ shows the community spirit is strong. And
column20: that spirit will likely grow even stronger in years to come. " True link
